name: A Leap Towards The Light | Tech Demo
name_original: A Leap Towards The Light | Tech Demo
description:
A prototype/tech demo for a game concept where you can only interact with what you can see.

I removed all the dialogue so the light character is now basically just a tutorial. Yeah.

I made this as a quick little side project. I have other stuff to do so I'll probably get back to work as soon as I finish this itch.io page lol.
